Local SEO
Houston Dominate your local market

Work with a local SEO consultant in Houston to help you expand your business and be found on the first page of Google search results. 

Schedule a 30 minute call

What is Local SEO?

Local SEO tells search engines like Google what you offer, where you’re located, and how to contact you. You’ll also appear on the right hand side of the search results in the Google Maps section. This will allow you to be favored by Google and other search engines over your competitors. You’ll be listed higher when people search with specific terms like “near me” or via your zip code, or city and state. 

More about SEO

Local Search Results

Show up on the first page with keyword-specific searches related to your business and your location. 

More about Video SEO

Competitor Analysis

How and where do your competitors rank? What are they doing different? Let’s find out and overtake them.

About Us

Before MetricsMule, we co-founded two small businesses in the automotive industry. We grew them to massive levels with the power of SEO and Local SEO. We went from non-existent in the search results to consistently being ranked on the first page of Google Search Results and other search engines.  But this doesn’t just apply to the automotive industry, we can do the same for anyone, anywhere (not just Houston or Texas). Let’s do the same for you, today! Keyword Research | Competitor Analytis | On-Page SEO | Technical SEO | Google Ads | Video SEO

Google
My Business Get more business coming your way with local searches.

Local SEO is extremely important for you and for your local customers to find you. After optimizing your website and webpages for search engines, the next step to sky-rocket your growth to have a Google My Business page. 

  • 30% of all mobile searches are related to a specific location or a “near me” search
  • 75% of people who search for something local end up visiting that place
  • 27% of those people actually make a purchase 

Automotive
Local SEO Houston Local SEO: Automotive or Anywhere Else In Any Industry.

Are you in the automotive industry?Check out some features you can expect: 

  • Rank on the first page with keywords specific to your and your local market
  • Increase your online presence substantially and receive more business
  • Generate customer reviews 
You can even appear in the search results with quality videos, just like we’ve done before.Even if you’re not in the automotive repair industry, it doesn’t matter. Our same, successful strategies will apply to anyone, in any industry. Let’s get started with yours!

Tips To Improve Your Local SEO

Google My Business Page

Almost 50% of all searches have “local intent”. For example people will search for a product or service and use terms like “near me” or include their zip code, city and state. A Google My Business page allows you to show up on the first page in the search results as well as in Maps and Apps. 

Local Keyword Research

Which keywords are most important for you to be found? Research those with a comprehensive tool like SemRush or Ahrefs and determine which ones you need to be targeting locally. Now, it’s time to optimize those to ensure you appear in local SEO search. 

On-Page Optimization

Content is King. But good content like helpful blog posts with at least 1k words (or more), YouTube videos, FAQs with Schema markup, and how-tos.  Google does not like filler content and will penalize you for it. 

Local SEO Houston

Yes, we’re in Houston but we provide our results-driven SEO strategies for anyone in any industry and any city or state. Contact us today! 

Texas SEO Do we only serve Houston or Tomball, Texas?

No, of course not! We serve anyone, in any city or state. We have clients throughout the U.S. but happen to be located in Tomball/Houston, TX. The same incredibly successful local SEO strategies we implement for Houston, Tomball, The Woodlands, or Cypress, Texas, will be applied to your city. So, why is local SEO important?Let’s take our location, for example, Houston, TX. Local SEO is a big difference-maker for local businesses. Did you know almost 50% of all searches in Google have “local intent”?  This means that almost half of online searches have terms relating to your local community. Here are a few examples below…

  • “Collision repair Houston, TX”
  • “Body shop near me”
  • “Auto repair shop 77377”
  • “Fix my car 77095”
  • “Automotive Repair in Tomball Texas”
See the common trend here? That’s local SEO, and it’s important because when people search for those terms, it’s important that your business shows up in Google Maps or on Google’s First Page for Google My Business.

What you see above are just some highlighted details of what each package includes. It is not a complete, exhaustive list.

SEO takes time, so it’s recommended for at least a 6-month commitment, although more is ideal.
